> [{quoted}](name=LuckyPaws,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wyhEeVPp,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-13T00:26:29.188+0000)

> LuckyPaws: easiest repurrt ever
> LuckyPaws: not trolling like our jax
> LuckyPaws: jax trolled us badly
> Post-Game
> LuckyPaws: 5v4 not fun

These things you said were directly contrary to Riot's specific behavioral policies: announcing that you're going to report someone and making an issue out of it, accusing them of trolling, etc. are considered harassment. They don't help the situation, and all they really do is tilt the whole team. Apart from that, you were arguing and bickering pretty much the entire time.

A replay isn't necessary, because you're being punished for things you said in chat, which won't show up in a replay. The behavior of other players isn't relevant here, because you're punished only for your own actions.
Share a screenshot of the log if you can
